Others: The pitch at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy will allow for good stroke play.
The surface will not allow a lot of assistance to the bowlers and wicket taking is going to be difficult.
The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 228 runs.
The team winning the toss should look to bowl first as the majority of the games played on this ground have been won by the chasing side.
Temperature is expected to be around 25.74 Â°C with 84% humidity.
Cloud cover expected, so expect some movement to aid the pace bowlers.
There is moderate rain expected which may affect playing conditions.
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike.
